languages.text: Сгнивший брикет из трупной муки — паек пассажира. Судя по остаточным запахам, в него было добавлено успокоительное средство.

traits.locale_text: Сгнивший брикет из трупной муки — паек пассажира. Судя по остаточным запахам, в него было добавлено успокоительное средство.

languages.text: A rotten brick of corpse starch — a passenger's rations. Judging by the lingering smell, it was dosed with a sedative.
languages.original_text: Сгнивший брикет из трупной муки — паек пассажира. Судя по остаточным запахам, в него было добавлено успокоительное средство.

traits.locale_text: A rotten brick of corpse starch — a passenger's rations. Judging by the lingering smell, it was dosed with a sedative.
A rotten brick of corpse starch — a passenger's rations. Judging by the lingering smell, it was dosed with a sedative.
A rotten brick of corpse starch — a passenger's rations. Judging by the lingering smell, it was dosed with a sedative.
A rotten brick of corpse starch — a passenger's rations. Judging by the lingering smell, it was dosed with a sedative.

languages.text: 一块腐烂的尸体淀粉口粮。从上面依然残留的味道判断，口粮中被注入了镇定剂。
languages.original_text: A rotten brick of corpse starch — a passenger's rations. Judging by the lingering smell, it was dosed with a sedative.

traits.locale_text: 一块腐烂的尸体淀粉口粮。从上面依然残留的味道判断，口粮中被注入了镇定剂。

languages.text: Un ladrillo putrefacto de almidón de cadáveres, las raciones de un pasajero. A juzgar por el olor, contenía un sedante.
languages.original_text: A rotten brick of corpse starch — a passenger's rations. Judging by the lingering smell, it was dosed with a sedative.

traits.locale_text: Un ladrillo putrefacto de almidón de cadáveres, las raciones de un pasajero. A juzgar por el olor, contenía un sedante.

languages.text: 腐ったコープススターチの塊…乗客の配給品だ。かすかに残った匂いから判断するに、鎮痛剤が投与されていたようだ。
languages.original_text: A rotten brick of corpse starch — a passenger's rations. Judging by the lingering smell, it was dosed with a sedative.

traits.locale_text: 腐ったコープススターチの塊――乗客の配給品だ。かすかに残った匂いから判断するに、鎮痛剤が投与されていたようだ。

languages.text: Ein verfaultes Stück Leichenstärke – die Ration eines Passagiers. Dem Geruch nach zu urteilen, wurde es mit einem Beruhigungsmittel versetzt.
languages.original_text: A rotten brick of corpse starch — a passenger's rations. Judging by the lingering smell, it was dosed with a sedative.

traits.locale_text: Ein verfaultes Stück Leichenstärke – die Ration eines Passagiers. Dem Geruch nach zu urteilen, wurde es mit einem Beruhigungsmittel versetzt.

languages.text: Une ration frelatée de viande recyclée. Vu l'odeur persistante qui vous chatouille les narines, elle contient également une bonne dose de sédatif.
languages.original_text: A rotten brick of corpse starch — a passenger's rations. Judging by the lingering smell, it was dosed with a sedative.

traits.locale_text: Une ration frelatée de viande recyclée. Vu l'odeur persistante qui vous chatouille les narines, elle contient également une bonne dose de sédatif.

languages.text: Yolcuların kumanya olarak kullandığı, çürümüş bir ceset nişastası. Yoğun kokudan anlaşıldığı kadarıyla içine sakinleştirici katılmış.
languages.original_text: A rotten brick of corpse starch — a passenger's rations. Judging by the lingering smell, it was dosed with a sedative.

traits.locale_text: Yolcuların kumanya olarak kullandığı, çürümüş bir ceset nişastası. Yoğun kokudan anlaşıldığı kadarıyla içine sakinleştirici katılmış.
